original_text: But I promise you this: Nobody can stop the agreement that I have made with the day and the night. I have also commanded the earth and the sky to obey certain laws.
korean_text: 여호와께서 이와 같이 말씀하시니라 내가 주야와 맺은 언약이 없다든지 천지의 법칙을 내가 정하지 아니하였다면

sentences.korean_translation: 아무도 그 약정을 막을 수 없다

sentences.original_text: that I have made with the day and the night
I have also commanded the earth and the sky
